availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James M. Blackburn (farm worker, Pendleton county)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farm worker. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah E. Jayne Blackburn in Pendleton County on October 19, 1842. Father of William J. Blackburn, Deb Blackburn, Adison D. Blackburn, Rebecca A. Blackburn, Sarah Blackburn, Marlin J. Blackburn, and Melvina P. Blackburn. Farm worker in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 52.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #000272806.
